text:
做到自律，几乎一切皆有可能。
With self-discipline most anything is possible.

不会做小事的人，也做不出大事来。
Those who can not do trivial things can not accomplish great things.

事情愈艰难，最后愈能得到丰厚的果实。
The more difficult something is, the more rewarding it is in the end.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月4日)
text:
志在峰巅的攀登者，不会陶醉在沿途的某个脚印之中。
The climber who aims for the peak is not enchanted by footprints along the road.

在事情未完成之前，一切都看似不可能。
It always seems impossible until it's done.

你没那么多观众，别那么累。
Never be troubled by the opinions of others.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
生命之灯因热情而点燃，生命之舟因拼搏而前行。
Life glows with devotion. It goes forth with resolution.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：世上只有一种英雄主义，就是在认清生活真相之后依然热爱生活。

生活的道路一旦选定，就要勇敢地走到底。
Once you choose your way of life, be brave to stick it out.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月3日)
text:
拥有一个新目标，或做一个新的梦，什么时候都不算晚。
It's never too late to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

成功没有定律，但你可从失败中学到很多东西。
Success has no rules, but you can learn a great deal from failure.

强大的头脑加上善良的内心永远是令人敬畏的。
A good head and a good heart are always a formidable combination.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
我们生活的目的不是取得富足，而是把心态调为富足。
Abundance is not something we acquire. It is something we tune into.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月27日)
text:
肤浅的人相信运气，而成功的第一秘诀是相信自己。
Shallow men believe in luck. Self-trust is the first secret of success.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
与其临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网。
Better start spinning a net than simply wishing for fish.

人生不是得到和拥有什么，而是给予和成为什么。
Life is not about getting and having, it is about giving and being.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
即使是不成熟的尝试，也胜于胎死腹中的计划。
Unseasoned actions are more worthy than aborted plans.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月9日)
text:
希望你所有梦想都成真，即使是那些曾被人嘲笑的梦想。
May all your dreams come true -- even the ones others laughed at.

如果你无法做伟大的事，那就以伟大的方式做小事。
If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
我人生最痛苦的时刻，也是我展现最多力量与勇气的时刻。
The most painful moment in my life also became the moment I showed the most strength and courage.

获得自信的最好方法是做你不敢做的事。
The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
人的生命，似洪水奔流，不遇岛屿和暗礁，难以激起美丽的浪花。
Human life is like flowing water; only when it hits isles and reefs can it create beautiful waves.

学识是宝藏，但实践才是打开它的钥匙。
Knowledge is a treasure but practice is the key to it.

紧握拳头你就无法与他人握手。
You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.

心态积极，好事自然发生。
When you think positive, good things happen.

为了不确定的事而放弃确定的事是不明智的。
He is no wise man who will quit a certainty for an uncertainty.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
快乐是努力换来的。
Working hard makes people happy.

没有伟大的意志力，便没有雄才大略。
There is no such thing as a great talent without great will.

事情愈艰难，最后愈能得到丰厚的果实。
The more difficult something is, the more rewarding it is in the end.

对未来的最大慷慨，是把一切献给现在。
Seizing the moment is the best thing for your future.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(9月25日)
text:
生活不似看上去那般容易，但也没有我们想象的那么难。
Life isn't as easy as it seems, and it's not as difficult as imagined.

除辛勤工作之外，我别无成功的秘诀。
I have no secret of success but hard work.

领先的诀窍是展开行动。
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

志在峰巅的攀登者，不会陶醉在沿途的某个脚印之中。
The climber who aims for the peak is not enchanted by footprints along the road.

真正的自由是在所有时候都能控制自己。
True liberty is to have power over oneself in all things.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
快乐属于那些敢于梦想，并且时刻准备去实现梦想的人。
Happiness belongs to those who dare to have dreams and are ready to make them real.

为他人带来阳光的人，自己也一定会沐浴在阳光下。
Those who bring sunshine to others will bathe in sunshine themselves.

不创造幸福的人无权享用幸福。
We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：人生只有走出来的美丽，没有等出来的辉煌。

没有激流就称不上勇进，没有山峰则谈不上攀登。
Without a riptide, there is no surfing. Without a cliff, there is no climbing.

勇气是一架梯子, 其他美德全靠它爬上去。
Courage is the ladder on which all other virtues mount.

当你再也没有什么可以失去的时候，就是你开始得到的时候。
When you have nothing to lose, you have everything to gain.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
成功的秘诀是把平凡的事做好。
The secret of success is to do common things uncommonly well.

懂得自己无知，说明已有收获。
Understanding their ignorance is rewarding.

如果不尝试一些新的东西，你的人生会了无生趣。
If you never try something new, your life story will be boring.

知识要用心体会，才能变成自己的智慧。
Only the knowledge with thorough reflection can become their own wisdom.

每个人都是自己命运的建筑师。
Each man is the architect of his own fate.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：世上没有绝望的处境，只有对处境绝望的人。

如果你培养出了学习的热情，你就永远不会停止成长。
Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
我们可以忘掉失败，但要牢记失败中的教训。
We may forget our failures, but we must remember the lessons learned from the failures.

容易走的，都是下坡路。
When you feel at ease, everything is downhill.

若坏事没有先发生，许多好的事情永远不会发生。
Many of the good things would never have happened if the bad events hadn’t happened first.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
人难免天生有自怜的情绪，唯有时刻保持清醒，才能看清真正的价值在哪里。
Everyone is born with self pity. Only through a clear mind can one discover the true values of life.

享受自己的生活，不要和别人比较。
Enjoy your own life without comparing it with that of another.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
世界让我遍体鳞伤，但伤口长出的却是翅膀。
The world makes us black and blue, but wings will grow out of the wounds.

当坚强成为你唯一的选择，你才知道自己可以有多坚强。
You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.

成功的秘诀是把平凡的事做好。
The secret of success is to do common things uncommonly well.

吸引好运的人，总是在时刻准备着。
The man who attracts luck carries with him the magnet of preparation.

你总是泰然处事, 那就是活在当下。
If you are at peace, you are living in the moment.

当你拥有翅膀，别停留在原地。带上那些梦想，让它们都成真。
If you have wings you can't stay on the ground. Take off with your dreams and make them all come true.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
最令人满足的事，是完成那些看似无法完成的事。
The most rewarding things you do in life are often the ones that look like they are impossible.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
想要帮助自己，必须直面真正的自己。
To help yourself, you must face up to your true self.

命运给予我们的不是失望之酒，而是机会之杯。
Our destiny offers not the cup of despair, but the chalice of opportunity.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
环境因素或许会带来干扰或耽搁，但别让你的目标从视线离开。
Circumstances may cause interruptions or delays, but never lose sight of your goal.

纪律是连接目标和成功的桥梁。
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

不要高估了自己，不要低估了别人，只有自己最了解自己。
Never overestimate yourself or underestimate others. Only you can know yourself.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
快乐也好，伤痕也罢，经历殷实饱满，内心方才强大充盈。
No matter whether happy or sad, only with a strong,rich heart can you live a full life.

烦恼并不会帮你减少明天的负担，却会令你失去今天的快乐。
Worrying about tomorrow's troubles will make you lose today’s happiness.

生命之灯因热情而点燃，生命之舟因拼搏而前行。
Life glows with devotion. It goes forth with resolution.

崭新的一天到来，总是给人带来新的力量和思想。
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts .

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
为他人带来阳光的人，自己也一定会沐浴在阳光下。
Those who bring sunshine to others will bathe in sunshine themselves.

成功是得到你所追求的, 而幸福则是满意你所拥有的.
Success is getting what you want; happiness is being satisfied with what you get.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月4日)
text:
幸福是一种选择，需要努力再努力。
Happiness is a choice that requires effort.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月13日)
text:
命运如同手中的掌纹，无论多曲折，终掌握在自己手中。
Fate is like palm print, no matter how many twists and turns, it always lies in your own hands.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月21日)
text:
每当你看到黑暗，烛光就有绝佳机会燃烧得更明亮。
It's always darkest before the dawn.

志在峰巅的攀登者，不会陶醉在沿途的某个脚印之中。
The climber who aims for the peak is not enchanted by footprints along the road.

幸福与道德责任息息相关，不可分割。
Happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：父亲的爱庄重而深刻，朴实而真挚，慈祥而温暖，博大而厚重。失落时，他为我们遮风挡雨；寒冷时，他给我们温暖关怀。爸，节日快乐！

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
最困难的是下决定，剩下的只是坚持。
Making a decision is most difficult. After that the only thing left is tenacity.

用你的笑容去改变世界，别让世界改变了你的笑容。
Use your smile to change the world.Don't let the world change your smile.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
尊严来自实力，实力来自拼搏。
Dignity lies in ability, and ability lies in working hard.

人必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。
You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret.

每个人都是自己命运的建筑师。
Each man is the architect of his own fate.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月28日)
text:
除辛勤工作之外，我别无成功的秘诀。
I have no secret of success but hard work.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月11日)
text:
人生最大的快乐，是做到别人认为你做不到的事情。
The great pleasure in life is doing what people say you can not do.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
我们都有未开发的潜能，唯有挑战极限你才能发掘它们.
Everyone has potential yet to be explored. The only way to discover it is to find your extremes.

如果道路本身很美，不要问它通向何方。
If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：对美德的回报是美德，获得友谊的唯一途径是给人以友谊。——爱默生The only reward of virtue is virtue; the only way to have afriend is to be one.——Ralph Waldo Emerson

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月25日)
text:
做必要之事，尽可能之事，成不可能之事。
Start by doing what's necessary, then what's possible, and eventually you can achieve the impossible.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
对于最有潜力的领航人，风浪总是格外地汹涌。
Winds and waves are always on the side of the best navigators.

有些事情不是看到希望才去坚持，而是坚持了才会看到希望。
Some things are not to see to insist, but insisted the will sees hope.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月9日)
text:
人生就是一次冒险，走得最远的人通常是愿意冒险并敢于冒险的人。
All life is a chance. The man who goes furthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
你如果拒绝面对错误，真相也会被挡在门外。
If you shut the door to all errors, the truth will also be shut out.

聆听他人之意见，但保留自己之判断。
Take each man's censure, but reserve thy judgment.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月4日)
text:
如果有选择，那就选择最好的；如果没有选择，那就努力做到最好。
If you have choices, choose the best. If you have no choice, do the best.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
生活的悲剧不在于人们受到多少苦，而在于人们错过了什么。
The tragedy of life is not how much one suffers, but what one misses.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月1日)
text:
人云亦云很容易，考验勇气的是你能否保持己见。
It's easy to stand with the crowd. It takes courage to stand alone.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
人与人之间最短的距离是微笑。
The shortest distance between people is a smile.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月5日)
text:
如果总是抓着悲伤不肯放手，那你永远也不会真正地快乐。
You will never be truly happy if you never let go of the things that make you sad.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
平凡的脚步也可以走完伟大的行程。
Ordinary steps can complete a great journey.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月7日)
text:
山涧的泉水经过一路曲折，才唱出一支美妙的歌。
Only by going through twists and turns, can mountain streams lives happily.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月10日)
text:
为了无可取代，你必须和别人不一样。
In order to be incomparable,one must always be different.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月16日)
text:
人与人之间最短的距离是微笑。
The shortest distance between people is a smile.

如果我们有勇气去追求，所有的梦想都可以实现。
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

真正压垮我们的其实是我们自己的态度
What can really beat you down is your attitude.

未来属于相信梦想之美的人。
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
如果你有梦想，就必须捍卫它。
Should you have any dream, you must go out and fight for it.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
泪水会为你带来同情，汗水会为你带来结果。
Tears may bring sympathy,but sweat will be paid off.

你不努力，谁都给不了你想要的生活。
If you don't work hard, no one else will give you the life you want.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
好运只是个副产品，只有当你不带任何私心杂念，单纯地去做事情时，它才会降临。
Luck is just a by-product. Good luck comes from a pure mind free of egoism.

称得上卓越的不是技能，而是态度。
Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：人生的烦恼，多在于知道得太多，而做得太少。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
永远不要认为我们可以逃避，我们的每一步都决定着最后的结局。
Never think that you can escape life's difficulties. Each step you take leads to the end.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月28日)
text:
新的一天伴随着新的力量和新的思想。
With a new day comes  new strength and new thoughts.

在时间迫使你去羡慕曾经拥有之前，学着珍惜你现在拥有的一切。
Learn to appreciate what you have before time forces you to mourn for what you had.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月9日)
text:
人生就是一次冒险，走得最远的人通常是愿意冒险并敢于冒险的人。
All life is a chance. The man who goes furthest is generally the one who is willing to do and dare.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：再长的路，一步步也能走完；再短的路，不迈开双脚也无法到达。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
河流之所以能够终流大海，是因为它懂得如何绕过障碍。
A river can eventually flow into the sea because it learns how to avoid obstacles.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月14日)
text:
命运如同手中的掌纹，无论多曲折，终掌握在自己手中。
Fate is like palm print, no matter how many twists and turns, it always lies in your own hands.

生活会继续，明天会更好。
Life does go on, and it will be better tomorrow.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月6日)
text:
不要未尽全力就轻言放弃。
Don't give up when you still have something to give.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月27日)
text:
一个人知道为什么而活，就可以从容面对任何生活。
Once a man knows what he lives for,he can easily face any kind of life.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月12日)
text:
别让过去之事占据今天太多时间。
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
成功是得到你所追求的, 而幸福则是满意你所拥有的.
Success is getting what you want; happiness is being satisfied with what you get.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月10日)
text:
每个新的一天，都是改变你人生的又一次机会。
Every new day is another chance to change your life.

实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。
The only barriers to your ideals tomorrow are your doubts today.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
你多学一样本事，就少说一句求人的话。
The more skills you learn, the less chances you will ask for help.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
快乐不在于拥有或得到，它在于给予。
Happiness lies neither in having nor getting, but only in giving.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：成功者和其他人最大的区别就是，他们真正动手去做了。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：最好的保鲜就是不断进步，让自己成为一个更好和更值得爱的人。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：有目标的人，走得再慢，也是进步。

拥有一个新目标，或做一个新的梦，什么时候都不算晚。
It's never too late to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
品格之于人，犹如芳香之于花。
Personality is to a man, what scent is to a flower.

成功的秘诀是把平凡的事做好。
The secret of success is to do common things uncommonly well.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(9月24日)
text:
没有大笑的一天，等于浪费了一天。
A day without laughter is a day wasted.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:

我们无法重拾昨天，但可以赢得或输掉明天。
Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.

想要帮助自己，必须直面真正的自己。
To help yourself, you must face up to your true self.

得失成败尽量置之度外，只求竭其所能，无愧于心。
Ignore both gains and losses. Spare no effort. Have no regrets.

太想伸手摘取星星的人常常忘记脚下的鲜花。
Stretching his hand up to the stars, men always forget the flowers at his feet.

哪怕行动再小也全心全意地投入，这就是成功的秘密。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月7日)
text:
爱不是用眼睛看，而是用心去感受。
Love does not see with the eyes, but feels with the heart.

做必要之事，尽可能之事，成不可能之事。
Start by doing what's necessary, then do what's possible, and suddenly you are doing the impossible.

少讲多做是大智者的特性。
To say little and perform much is the characteristic of great minds.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月25日)
text:
健康是人生第一财富。
The first wealth is health.

懂得自己无知，说明已有收获。
Understanding their ignorance is rewarding.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
如果你想要从未拥有过的东西，那么你必须做你从未做过的事。
If you want things you have never had, you have to do things that you have never done.

人生不是彩排，没有重播键。
Life is not a rehearsal—there is no replay button.

尽管做你自己热爱的事情并且相信它，成功自然到来。
Do what you love and believe in, and success will come.

你可以逃避现实，但你不能逃避因逃避现实所产生的后果。
You can avoid reality, but you cannot avoid the consequences of avoiding reality.

设计目标是将愿景清晰化的第一步。
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
今天做到最好是对明天最好的准备！
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
没有等出来的辉煌，只有走出来的美丽。
No glory is attained by waiting. Grace only comes after an ardous journey.

你能为世界做最好的事，就是完全发挥自己的才能。
The best thing you can do for the world is to make the most of yourself.

生活只有一次，但如果你选对了路，一次也就够了。
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

如果你看到面前的阴影，别怕，那是因为你的背后有阳光。
If there is darkness ahead, don't be afraid, it means the sun is shining on your back.

Happiness is a matter of life-style,not a mood.

做你说过的，说你能做的。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月14日)
text:

求知若饥，虚心若愚。
Stay hungry,stay foolish.

要是昨天摔倒了，那今天就重新站起来。
If you failed yesterday, try again today.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：你说梦想遥不可及，可你又何曾为梦想早起？ You say that dreams are out of reach, but did you ever get up early for your dreams?

We will not be defeated unless we give up.

人生不是彩排，没有重播键。
Life is not a rehearsal—there is no replay button.

与其临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网。
Better start spinning a net than simply wishing for fish.

不断的自律及自我控制可以培养出非凡的性格。
By constant self-discipline and self-control, you can develop greatness of character.

你的任务不是寻找爱，而是寻找并发现所有你内在所建筑不让爱进来的障碍。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
要有最朴素的生活和最遥远的梦想，即使明日天寒地冻，路远马亡。
One must have the simplest lifestyle and the highest dreams, even if the world falls and all means are deprived.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月16日)
text:
只要路是对的，就不要害怕它是短暂还是遥远，因为你终究会到达。
If you're going in the right direction, the distance doesn't matter.

态度比能力更能决定一个人的成败。
Attitude is more important to success than ability.

心怀大想法，享受小乐趣。
Think big thoughts but relish small pleasures.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月2日)
text:
知不如用，想不如做。
Knowing is no better than trying, and thinking is no better than doing.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(9月29日)
text:
战胜了疑虑和恐惧，就战胜了失败。
Those who have conquered doubt and fear have conquered failure.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:

看清自己比读懂他人更重要。

当你再也没有什么可以失去的时候，就是你开始得到的时候。
When you have nothing to lose, you have everything to gain.

爱就是真心地欣赏；欣赏就是理智地爱。

每日一语：不必强求完美，也不必苛求他人眼中的完整，追求你梦想中的家庭，然后，爱你得到的。心安之处即是家。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
走到你能看到的最远之处，当你到达，你会看到更远的地方。
Go as far as you can see. When you get there you'll be able to see further.

拥有一个新目标，或做一个新的梦，什么时候都不算晚。
It's never too late to set another goal or to dream a new dream.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月9日)
text:

人与人之间最短的距离是微笑。
The shortest distance between people is a smile.

完成伟大的事业不在于体力，而在于坚韧不拔的毅力。
Great works are performed not by strength, but by perseverance.

完成伟大的事业不在于体力，而在于坚韧不拔的毅力。
Great works are performed not by strength， but by perseverance.

你如果拒绝面对错误，真相也会被挡在门外。
If you shut the door to all errors, truth will be shut out.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月22日)
text:

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(9月26日)
text:
每个人都有不为人知的故事，不要轻易对别人品头论足。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月1日)
text:

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:

态度比能力更能决定一个人的成败。
Attitude is more important to success than ability.

益友、良书和一颗宁静的心，这就是理想的生活。
Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.

从希望中得到欢乐，在苦难中保持坚韧。
Rejoice in hope, be patient in tribulation.

伟人之所以伟大，是因为他立志要成为伟大的人。
The reason why a great man is great is that he resolves to be a great man.

能处处寻求快乐的人才是最富有的人。
That man is the richest whose pleasure are the cheapest.

善待生活，热爱一切，经常开怀大笑。
live well, love lots, and laugh often.

地球是圆的，而看似像终点的地方可能也只是起点。
The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.

你若想要得到，就别只是期望。人生短暂，经不起等待。
If you want something, don't just wish for it. Life is too short to wait.

学习昨天，活在今天，期待明天。
Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.

快乐的人也会让别人感到快乐。
Whoever is happy will make others happy too.

如果你认为重要，总会想到办法。如果你认为不重要，总会找理由。
If it is important to you, you will find a way. If not, you'll find an excuse.

即使在最黑暗的日子里，也能寻到生活中的闪光点。
Happiness can be found even in the darkest time.

最令人满足的事，是完成那些看似无法完成的事。
The most rewarding things you do in life are often the ones that look like they cannot be done.

地球是圆的，而看似像终点的地方可能也只是起点。
The world is round and the place which may seem like the end may also be only the beginning.

这世界会因你的典范，而不是你的意见而改变。
The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.

好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。
Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.

如果总是抓着悲伤不肯放手，那你永远也不会真正地快乐。
You will never be truly happy if you never let go of the things that make you sad.

接受挑战能让你感受胜利的喜悦。
Challenges can turn out to be the joy in victory.

成功是清晨醒来，对自己的人生充满期待。
Success is waking up in the morning, so excited about what you have to do.

不要把生命浪费于怀疑与恐惧中。
Don't waste life in doubts and fears.

一个人知道为什么而活，就可以从容面对任何生活。
Once a man knows what he lives for,he can easily face any kind of life.

与其抱怨不停，不如全力去做好它。
Instead of complaining about it, I'm just gonna go in every day and give it my all.

最可怕的敌人，就是没有坚强的信念。
The most fearful enemy is not having a firm conviction.

可以说成功要靠三件事才能赢得：努力，努力，再努力。
I might say that success is won by three things：first, effort; second, more effort; third, still more effort.

成功者是坚持梦想不放弃的人。
A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.

吸引好运的人，总是在时刻准备着。
The man who attracts luck carries with him the magnet of preparation.

今天你播种了什么，明天你就会收获什么。
What you plant now, you will harvest later.

你多学一样本事，就少说一句求人的话。
The more skills you learn, the less chances you will ask for help.

强者自救，圣者渡人。
A strong man can save himself, a great man can save another.

不要只因一次挫败，就放弃你原来决心想达到的梦想。
Do not, for one repulse, forgo the purpose that you resolved to effect.

想像出的障碍无法被克服，但真的障碍可以。
Imaginary obstacles are insurmountable. Real ones aren’t.

一个今天胜似两个明天。
One today is worth two tomorrows.

伟大的理想造就伟大的人。
Great hopes make great man.

教育不是装满一桶水，而是点燃一把火。
Education is not filling a bucket, but lighting a fire.

快乐，是一种生活方式的选择，而不仅是一种情绪。
Happiness is a matter of life-style, not a mood.

如果你看到面前的阴影，那是因为你的背后有阳光。
If you saw the darkness in front of you, that's because sunshine is at your back.

与其抱怨不停，不如卯足劲儿全力去做好它。
Instead of complaining about it, I'm just gonna go in every day and give it my all.

人生难免有起落，不抱怨，不解释，要做的就是坚持！
Life is full of inevitable highs and lows. Don't complain, don't explain, just maintain.

你的腰不弯，别人就无法骑在你的背上。
A man can’t ride your back unless it is bent.

最令人满足的事，是完成那些看似无法完成的事。
The most rewarding things you do in life are often the ones that look like they cannot be done.

生活有时会让我们受伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方一定会变成我们最强壮的地方。
Life sometimes hurts us, but in the end, our injuries will turn into our utmost strengths.

别因为一次失败，就放弃你原先所要达到的目的。
Do not, for one repulse, give up the purpose that you resolved to effect.

除辛勤工作之外，我别无成功的秘诀。
I have no secret of success but hard work.

进步是今天的活动、明天的保证。
Progress is the action of today and the assurance of tomorrow.

实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。
The only barriers to your ideals tomorrow are your doubts today.

全心全意地寻找才会有所发现。
Discovery comes only to a mind immersed in its pursuit.

做你说过的，说你能做的。
Do what you said,say what you can do.

你必须相信自己，这是成功的秘诀。
You have to believe in yourself. That's the secret of success.

没有一颗珍珠的闪光，是靠别人涂抹上去的。
There is no pearl which glistens by the effort of others.

你热爱生命吗？那么，别浪费时间，因为生命是由时间组成的。
Do you love life? Then do not squander time;for that's the stuff life is made of.

天才只意味着终身不懈的努力。
Genius only means hard-working all one's life .

一个人越懒，明天要做的事越多。
The lazier a person is, the more things he needs to do tomorrow.

真友谊最美的一个特质是了解和被了解。
One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.

我可以接受失败，但绝对不能接受自己未曾奋斗过。
I can accept failure, but I can't accept not trying.

一个人越懒，明天要做的事越多。
The lazier a person is, the more things he needs to do tomorrow.

要以悲观的彻悟，乐观地去工作去生活。
Expect the worst. Strive for the best.

带着激情做事，你就会有激情。
Act enthusiastically and you will be enthusiastic.

成功的秘诀是把平凡的事做好。
The secret of success is to do common things uncommonly well.

幸福是一种选择，需要努力再努力。
Happiness is a choice that requires effort.

要相信，梦里能到达的地方，总有一天，脚步也能到达。
Any place you can reach in your dreams can also be reached by foot.

进博会满月啦！抓住机遇的全球企业有多拼？
Whatever is worth doing at all is worth doing well.

全心全意寻找才会有所发现。
Discovery comes only to a mind immersed in its pursuit.

接受挑战能让你感受胜利的喜悦。
Challenges can turn out to be the joy in victory.

没有一颗珍珠的闪光，是靠别人涂抹上去的。
There is no pearl which glistens by the effort of others.

现在就行动，没有人可以保证未来。
Go for it now.The future is promised to no one.

成功将属于那些从不说“不可能”的人。
Success will belong to those who never say "impossible".

要相信，梦里能到达的地方，总有一天，脚步也能到达。
Any place you can reach in your dreams can also be reached by foot.

天才只意味着终身不懈的努力。
Genius only means hard-working all one's life.

重要的不是活了多少年，而是这些年你怎么活。
It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

常常当你觉得你走到尽头时，你其实是在另一旅程的起点。
Often when you think you’re at the end of something, you’re at the beginning of something else.

先有坚定的信念才有不凡的行动。
Strong convictions precede great actions.

哪怕行动再小也全心全意地投入，这就是成功的秘密。
Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

失败永远不会赶上我，如果我成功的决心够强烈。
Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.

登上高峰后，你会发现还有更多的山峰要翻越。
After climbing a great hill, one only finds that there are many more hills to climb.

任何成就都是从决定尝试开始。
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.

爱情无法购买，感情亦是无价。
Love is not to be purchased, and affection has no price.

成功没有定律，但你可从失败中学到很多东西。
Success has no rules, but you can learn a great deal from failure.

让梦想大于胆怯，让行动盖过言语，信念强于感觉。
Let your dreams be bigger than your fears, your actions louder than your words, and your faith stronger than your feelings.

世界让我遍体鳞伤，但伤口长出的却是翅膀。
The world makes us black and blue, but wings will grow out of the wounds.

只要路是对的，就不要害怕它是短暂还是遥远，因为你终究会到达。
If you're going in the right direction, the distance doesn't matter.

Progress is the activity of today and the assurance of tomorrow.

除辛勤工作之外，我别无成功的秘诀。
I have no secret of success but hard work.

天才只意味着终身不懈的努力。
Genius only means hard-working all one's life.

你不努力，谁都给不了你想要的生活。
If you don't work hard, no one else will give you the life you want.

如果你看到面前的阴影，别怕，那是因为你的背后有阳光。
If there is darkness ahead, don't be afraid, it means the sun is shining on your back.

世界是一面镜子，你笑它便笑。
The world is a mirror: it smiles at your smile.

快乐，是一种生活方式的选择，而不仅是一种情绪。
Happiness is a matter of life-style, not a mood.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月13日)
text:
未来属于那些相信梦想之美好的人。
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月8日)
text:
相信自己比依赖别人重要。
Believing in yourself is more important than depending on others.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月5日)
text:
幸福，就是找一个温暖的人过一辈子。
Happiness is to find someone who can warm you up and share your life together.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月3日)
text:
懂得自己无知，说明已有收获。
Understanding their ignorance is rewarding.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(12月2日)
text:
知识要用心体会，才能变成自己的智慧。
Only the knowledge with thorough reflection can become their own wisdom.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(11月5日)
text:
只有把抱怨环境的心情，化为上进的力量，才是成功的保证。
Only by turning complaint into motivation can you succeed.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月31日)
text:
要是昨天摔倒了，那今天就重新站起来。
If you failed yesterday, try again today.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月29日)
text:
领先的秘诀在于从现在就开始。
The secret to taking the lead is starting now.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月22日)
text:
如果你因为错过太阳而哭泣，你将会错过繁星。
If you shed tears for missing the sun, you will miss the stars too.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻(10月6日)
text:
你若想要得到，就别只是期望。人生短暂，经不起等待。
If you want something, don't just wish for it. Life is too short to wait.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
每一天都是一个新的开始，不要再纠结于过去，想想现在能做点什么吧。
Every day is a new beginning. Don't get tangled up in the past, but think about what you can do in the present.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
成功，态度与能力一样重要。
To achieve success，attitude is as important as ability.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
活要活得美好，梦要梦得热烈，爱要爱得完整。
Live beautifully, dream passionately, love completely.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
人生拥有三件事便可真正快乐：有爱的人，有喜欢的事业，有梦想。
Three things that bring real happiness to your life:Having someone to love,doing the career you enjoy and owning a dream.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
不管前方的路有多苦，只要走的方向正确，都比站在原地更接近幸福。
No matter how hard the road ahead, as long as one moves in the right direction, happiness becomes closer than when standing in place.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
值得前往的地方都没有捷径。
There is no shortcut to any place worth going.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
态度比能力更能决定一个人的成败。
Attitude is more important to success than ability.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
要相信，梦里能到达的地方，总有一天，脚步也能到达。
Any place you can reach in your dreams can also be reached by foot.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
真实的、永恒的、最高级的快乐，只能从三样东西中取得：工作、自我克制和爱。
The real, eternal, highest happiness comes through three things: hard work, self-discipline and love.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
拼搏到无能为力，坚持到感动自己。
Work hard until you are exhausted. Persist until you are moved.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text:
人与人之间最小的差距是智商，最大的差距是坚持。
The smallest disparity between people is intelligence, whereas the greatest is persistence.

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：前半生不犹豫，后半生不后悔。

mpvoice: 智能小新为你读新闻（Beta版）
text: 每日一语：对别人要求松一点，就不会总失望；对自己要求严一点，就不会总沮丧。
